text: læa phwk khea di saban dwy phranam khx ngxallxhˌ doy kar saban xyang khængkhan khxng phwk khea wa hak cea mi kha sang kæ phwk khea nænxn phwk khea k ca xxk pi cng klaw theid (muhammad) phwk cea xya saban ley kar cheuxfang (khxng phwk cea nan) pen thi ru kan di thæ cring xallxhˌ nan thrng ru di ying nı sing thi phwk cea kratha
